item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, May 16, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Joe Biden blocks release of audio from classified documents probe
2. Starwood’s $10bn property fund taps credit line as investors pull money
3. Putin and Xi vow to co-operate against ‘destructive and hostile’ US
4. Bridgewater founder Dalio warns of danger of US debt to Treasury market
5. BT’s CEO says she ‘loves to squeeze’ short sellers as shares jump
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, May 16, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
